sentences.en: An orthodontist took a cast of the inside of Billy's mouth.
sentences.cn: 正畸医生从比利的口腔内部取了模型。

sentences.en: At Billy's Cafe, the menu is limited and the food is lousy.
sentences.cn: 比利咖啡馆的菜品选择有限，食物也很差。

sentences.en: Billy Bonds has never been one to avoid a scrap.
sentences.cn: 比利·邦兹经常与球员发生拳脚冲突。

sentences.en: Billy Ewing grabbed him by the elbow and took him aside.
sentences.cn: 比利·尤因拉着他的胳膊肘把他带到了一边。

sentences.en: Billy leaned forward and brushed a speck of dust off his shoes.
sentences.cn: 比利俯身擦掉了鞋子上的一丝灰尘。

sentences.en: Billy started to snivel. His mother smacked his hand.
sentences.cn: 比利抽抽搭搭地哭了起来。妈妈在他的手上打了一下。

sentences.en: Billy Sullivan had impressed me as a fine man.
sentences.cn: 比利·沙利文给我留下的印象是他是个很不错的人。

sentences.en: Billy tends to keep things to himself more and shut himself off.
sentences.cn: 比利往往更多地将事情藏在心里，把自己封闭起来。

sentences.en: Billy：But what if my friends see me.
sentences.cn: 比利：但要是我朋友看到怎幺办。

sentences.en: Even from behind in silhouette, Billy recognized the figure.
sentences.cn: 即便看到的只是背影的轮廓，比利还是认出了那个人影。

sentences.en: General Lewis Hyde had served under General "Billy" Mitchell.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯·海德将军曾是“比利”·米切尔将军的部下。

sentences.en: He had asked around and learned that Billy was not yet here.
sentences.cn: 他四处询问，得知比利还没到这儿。

sentences.en: He had four hundred dollars in his pocket. Billy had more.
sentences.cn: 他兜里有400美元，比利带的钱更多。

sentences.en: He poked a long bony finger in Billy's chest.
sentences.cn: 他用细长的手指捅了一下比利的胸口。

sentences.en: I tell you, Billy, she’s an angel.
sentences.cn: 我对你说，比利，她真是一个天使。

sentences.en: If you're a Billy Crystal fan, you'lllove this movie.
sentences.cn: 如果你是比利·克里斯托的影迷，你会喜爱这部影片。

sentences.en: You've done a fine job with Billy and Joey.
sentences.cn: 你和比利、乔伊一起干得非常出色。

trans.tran_cn: [男子名] 比利 William的昵称，[地名] [法国] 比伊
